name: @TMX_PLUGIN_NAME@
description: CDASim Adapter is the V2X-Hub plugin that facilitates the connection between the CDASim simulation environment and V2X-Hub and CARMA Streets.

configuration.description: The log level for this plugin

Name of the log file for this plugin. If a relative path is provided, this file will create a directory under /var/log/<PluginName> and add the file here. Not including this parameter or setting to (-) will direct log output to stdout which is the default behavior. NOTE: File logging for plugins should only be used for temporary data collection. Current file logging does not have mechanisms to purge data after a certain time or size.
Cartesian X coordinate in simulated map (in meters).
Cartesian Y coordinate in simulated map (in meters).
Cartesian Z coordinate in simulated map (in meters).

Number of connection attempts CDASimAdapter plugin will execute before failing. Valid values are any integers greater than or equal to 1. Any value less than 1 will result in unlimited connection attemtps.
Number of seconds to wait after a failed CDASim connection attempt, before retrying to establish connection. Valid values are equal or greater than 1. Any value less than 1 will be treated as 1.
